shortdesc.ph: Defines how data is transmitted across multiple network paths.

plentry.pd: (0): Sends the same data redundantly over all available paths.
(0): Redundant transmission mode. Data is sent simultaneously over multiple paths.
(0): Redundant transmission mode. Data is sent simultaneously over multiple paths to improve redundancy and reliability.
Transmits data only over the path determined by an internal algorithm to have the best transmission quality.
(1): Dynamic transmission mode. The SDK dynamically selects the optimal path for data transmission.
(1): Dynamic transmission mode. The SDK dynamically selects the optimal path for data transmission based on current network conditions to improve performance.
